items.sentence: I'll buy it off you if you make it a bit cheaper.
I prefer taking my shirt off when I go for a run.
I'm pretty good at cracking other people's backs.
Even though Tom was in pain, he managed to smile.
Would it be OK if I brought some friends with me?
Would it be OK if I crashed on your sofa tonight?
We've already survived many difficult situations.
We tend to judge people by the company they keep.
Why don't you pick on somebody else for a change?
Why don't you put your money where your mouth is?
